entry.data:
CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
